alert.note: Alert for Baca; Bent; Crowley; Kiowa; Las Animas; Otero; Prowers (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Air Quality Alert issued December 02 at 9:10AM MST by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...AIR QUALITY HEALTH ADVISORY FOR BLOWING DUST FROM 900 AM FRIDAY UNTIL 500 PM FRIDAY... The Colorado Department of Public Health and Environment has issued the following... WHAT...Air Quality Health Advisory for Blowing Dust. WHERE...Crowley, Yuma, Washington, Adams, Arapahoe, Elbert, Kit Carson, Lincoln, Cheyenne, Kiowa, Bent, Prowers, Otero, Las Animas and Baca Counties. Locations include, but are not limited to Ordway, Wray, Akron, Brighton, Deer Trail, Littleton, Kiowa, Burlington, Limon, Cheyenne Wells, Eads, Las Animas, Lamar, La Junta, Kim, Trinidad and Springfield. WHEN...900 AM Friday December 02 to 500 PM Friday December 02 IMPACTS...Strong and gusty winds will produce areas of blowing dust on Friday. The threat for blowing dust will decrease late Friday afternoon. HEALTH INFORMATION...Public Health Recommendations: Increasing likelihood of respiratory symptoms in sensitive individuals, aggravation of heart or lung disease and premature mortality in people with cardiopulmonary disease and older adults. People with heart or lung disease, older adults, and children should reduce prolonged or heavy exertion.
